meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one thousandth of a micron.
meanings.sent1: She measured the tiny bacteria in millimicrons to understand their size better.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a microscope to observe objects at the scale of millimicrons.
meanings.sent3: The millimicrons were so small that they decided to throw a party on a microscope slide.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nanotechnology, millimicrons are like the whispers of giants.
meanings.sent5: The concept of millimicrons can be mind-boggling, imagining things invisible to the naked eye.
